text.text: Apply to travel, study, work or immigrate to Canada, apply for citizenship, a permanent resident card or refugee protection, check the status of your application or find a form.e.

title.jcr:title: Sign in or create an account

text.text: Apply online, pay your fees, get your application status and check your messages
Get online updates for your application using basic personal details
Get the forms you need to apply to come to Canada, to apply for Canadian citizenship or to get a permanent resident card
How long it takes to process applications by type, country and how you applied (paper or online)
How to pay online or at a bank, based on what you applied for and where you are
How to request a refund, view your receipts and save a copy for your records
How to change your address, depending on where you are and if you have an application in progress right now

title.jcr:title: Ask about or update your application

text.text: Find out how to track, update or ask a question about your application
Who needs to get a police certificate, and how and where to get one in the country where you live
Find quick and direct answers to your questions, including how to complete application forms, extend visas and permits and replace lost documents.
Check the fee list to find how much your immigration or citizenship application fees will be.

title.jcr:title: How to send a complete immigration application

text.text: Learn ho to avoid common errors that can cause delays in processing your application to come to Canada.
